data.name: AcceptingTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade number

data.name: AutoUpdateCheckInfo
data.value: ASF 將每 {0}自動檢查新版本。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "24 hours")

data.name: Content
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by content string. Please note that this string should include newline for formatting.

data.name: ErrorConfigPropertyInvalid
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by name of the configuration property, {1} will be replaced by invalid value

data.name: ErrorEarlyFatalExceptionInfo
data.value: ASF V{0} 在能初始化核心日誌記錄模組之前就遇到了嚴重異常！
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by version number

data.name: ErrorEarlyFatalExceptionPrint
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by function name, {1} will be replaced by exception message, {2} will be replaced by entire stack trace. Please note that this string should include newlines for formatting.

data.name: ErrorExitingWithNonZeroErrorCode
data.value: 使用非零錯誤代碼退出！

data.name: ErrorFailingRequest
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by URL of the request

data.name: ErrorGlobalConfigNotLoaded
data.value: 無法載入全域配置。請確保 {0} 存在且有效！如果仍有疑惑，請參閱 Wiki 上的“用戶入門”指南。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by file's path

data.name: ErrorIsInvalid
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: ErrorObjectIsNull
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: ErrorParsingObject
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: ErrorRequestFailedTooManyTimes
data.value: 嘗試請求 {0} 次後失敗！
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by maximum number of tries

data.name: ErrorUpdateNoAssetForThisVersion
data.value: 無法繼續更新，因為沒有與當前正在運行的版本相關的資產！無法自動更新該版本。

data.name: ErrorUpdateNoAssets
data.value: 無法繼續進行更新，因為該版本尚未提供任何資產！

data.name: ErrorUserInputRunningInHeadlessMode
data.value: 收到一個用戶輸入請求，但進程當前正在無頭模式下運行！

data.name: IgnoringTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade number

data.name: LoggingIn
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by service's name

data.name: NoBotsAreRunning
data.value: 沒有運行中的機械人，正在退出……

data.name: RejectingTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade number

data.name: UnlockingParentalAccount
data.value: 正在解鎖家庭監護帳戶……

data.name: UpdateDownloadingNewVersion
data.value: 正在下載新版本：{0}（{1} MB）……等待期間，如果喜歡這個軟件，請考慮捐助 ASF！:)
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by version string, {1} will be replaced by update size (in megabytes)

data.name: UpdateNewVersionAvailable
data.value: ASF 有新版本可用！請考慮手動更新！

data.name: UpdateVersionInfo
data.value: 本地版本：{0} | 遠端版本：{1}
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by current version, {1} will be replaced by remote version

data.name: UserInputSteam2FA
data.value: 請輸入您的 Steam 身份驗證器應用程式上顯示的雙重驗證代碼：
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamGuard
data.value: 請輸入寄送至您的電子信箱的 Steam Guard 驗證代碼:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamLogin
data.value: 請輸入您的 Steam 帳戶:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamParentalCode
data.value: 請輸入 Steam 家庭監護 PIN 碼:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamPassword
data.value: 請輸入您的 Steam 密碼:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: WarningUnknownValuePleaseReport
data.value: 收到 {0} 的未知值，請回報這個問題：{1}
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name, {1} will be replaced by value for that object

data.name: BotAlreadyStopped
data.value: 這個機械人已經停止了！

data.name: BotNotFound
data.value: 找不到任何名為 {0} 的機械人！
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by bot's name query (string)

data.name: IgnoredPermanentPauseEnabled
data.value: 忽略此請求，因為強制暫停已啟用！

data.name: PlayingNotAvailable
data.value: 當前無法執行，我們將稍後再試！

data.name: WarningCouldNotCheckBadges
data.value: 無法取得徽章頁資訊，我們將稍後再試！

data.name: WarningCouldNotCheckCardsStatus
data.value: 無法檢查卡片狀態：{0}（{1}），我們將稍後再試！
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: BotAcceptingGift
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by giftID (number)

data.name: BotAddLicense
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by status string

data.name: BotAddLicenseWithItems
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by status string, {2} will be replaced by list of granted IDs (numbers), separated by a comma

data.name: BotAuthenticatorConverting
data.value: 正在將. maFile 轉換為 ASF 格式……

data.name: BotAuthenticatorImportFinished
data.value: 已成功導入行動驗證器！

data.name: BotAuthenticatorToken
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by generated 2FA token (string)

data.name: BotDisconnected
data.value: 已與 Steam 中斷連線！

data.name: BotEncryptedPassword
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by password encryption method (string), {1} will be replaced by encrypted password using that method (string)

data.name: BotInstanceNotStartingBecauseDisabled
data.value: 不會啟動此機械人實例，因為它在設定檔中被禁用！

data.name: BotInvalidAuthenticatorDuringLogin
data.value: 已連續收到 {0} 次 TwoFactorCodeMismatch 錯誤訊息。您的雙重驗證憑證可能已失效，或時鐘不同步，正在中止！
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by maximum allowed number of failed 2FA attempts

data.name: BotLoggedOff
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by logging off reason (string)

data.name: BotLoggedOn
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by steam ID (number)

data.name: BotLogonSessionReplaced
data.value: 這個帳戶似乎正被另一個 ASF 使用中，此為未定義行為，拒絕讓它繼續執行！

data.name: BotLootingMasterNotDefined
data.value: 無法發送交易提案，因為沒有帳戶設有 Master 權限！

data.name: BotNoASFAuthenticator
data.value: 該機械人並未啟用 ASF 雙重驗證！您是否忘記將驗證器導入成 ASF 雙重驗證？

data.name: BotNotOwnedYet
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by query (string)

data.name: BotOwnedAlreadyWithName
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: BotRateLimitExceeded
data.value: 超過頻率限制，我們將在 {0} 的冷卻時間後重試……
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "25 minutes")

data.name: BotRedeem
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by cd-key (string), {1} will be replaced by status string

data.name: BotRedeemWithItems
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by cd-key (string), {1} will be replaced by status string, {2} will be replaced by list of key-value pairs, separated by a comma

data.name: BotRemovedExpiredLoginKey
data.value: 已刪除過期的登錄金鑰！

data.name: BotStatusConnecting
data.value: 機器人正在連接到 Steam 網絡。

data.name: BotStatusPaused
data.value: 機械人已暫停或正在手動模式下運行。

data.name: BotStatusPlayingNotAvailable
data.value: 機械人當前正在使用中。

data.name: BotUnableToLogin
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by failure reason (string), {1} will be replaced by extended failure reason (string)

data.name: ErrorIsEmpty
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: UnusedKeys
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by list of cd-keys (strings), separated by a comma

data.name: WarningFailedWithError
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by failure reason (string)

data.name: BotConnectionLost
data.value: 與 Steam 網絡的連線中斷，正在重新進行連線……

data.name: BotHeartBeatFailed
data.value: 無法斷開與用戶端的連接。正在中止這個機械人實例！

data.name: BotSteamDirectoryInitializationFailed
data.value: 無法初始化 SteamDirectory：與 Steam 網絡的連接可能需要比平時更長的時間！

data.name: ErrorBotConfigInvalid
data.value: 您的機械人配置無效。請驗證 {0} 的內容，然後重試！
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by file's path

data.name: ErrorDatabaseInvalid
data.value: 無法載入持久數據庫，如果問題仍然存在，請刪除 {0}，以重新創建數據庫！
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by file's path

data.name: Initializing
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by service name that is being initialized

data.name: WarningPrivacyPolicy
data.value: 如果您對 ASF 的實際運作方式有疑慮，請查看我們 Wiki 中關於隱私政策的部分！

data.name: Welcome
data.value: 看來這是您首次使用 ASF，歡迎！

data.name: ErrorInvalidCurrentCulture
data.value: 您提供的 CurrentCulture 無效，ASF 將以預設值繼續運行！

data.name: WarningIdlingGameMismatch
data.value: ASF 檢測到 {0}（{1}）的 ID 不匹配，並將改為使用 ID {2}。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name, {2} will be replaced by game's ID (number)

data.name: BotVersion
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by program's name (e.g. "ASF"), {1} will be replaced by program's version (e.g. "1.0.0.0"). This string typically has nothing to translate and you should leave it as it is, unless you need to change the format, e.g. in RTL languages.

data.name: ErrorFunctionOnlyInHeadlessMode
data.value: 此功能僅在無頭模式下可用！

data.name: BotOwnedAlready
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: ClearingDiscoveryQueue
data.value: 正在瀏覽 Steam 探索佇列 #{0}...
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by queue number

data.name: DoneClearingDiscoveryQueue
data.value: 已完成 Steam 探索佇列 #{0}。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by queue number

data.name: BotOwnsOverviewPerGame
data.value: {0}/{1} 個機械人已經擁有遊戲 {2}。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of bots that already own particular game being checked, {1} will be replaced by total number of bots that were checked during the process, {2} will be replaced by game's ID (number)

data.name: WarningDeprecated
data.value: {0} 的用法已棄用，並將在程式的未來版本中刪除。請使用 {1}。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of deprecated property (such as argument, config property or likewise), {1} will be replaced by the name of valid replacement (such as another argument or config property)

data.name: BotAcceptedDonationTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade's ID (number)

data.name: WarningWorkaroundTriggered
data.value: 已觸發錯誤 {0} 的解決方法。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the bug's name provided by ASF

data.name: TargetBotNotConnected
data.value: 目標機械人實例未連線！

data.name: BotWalletBalance
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by wallet balance value, {1} will be replaced by currency name

data.name: BotHasNoWallet
data.value: 當前機械人無錢包餘額。

data.name: BotLevel
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by bot's level

data.name: ActivelyMatchingItems
data.value: 正在匹配 Steam 物品，第 #{0} 輪……
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by round number

data.name: DoneActivelyMatchingItems
data.value: 已完成匹配 Steam 物品，第 #{0} 輪。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by round number

data.name: ActivelyMatchingItemsRound
data.value: 此輪共匹配 {0} 套物品。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of sets traded

data.name: WarningExcessiveBotsCount
data.value: 您運行的個人機械人帳戶數目已經超出我們建議的上限（{0}）。請注意，此設置不受支援，可能會導致各種 Steam 相關問題，包括帳戶停權。有關詳細資訊，請參閱常見問題解答。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by our maximum recommended bots count (number)

data.name: PluginLoaded
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of the custom ASF plugin

data.name: PluginLoading
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of the custom ASF plugin, {1} will be replaced by its version

data.name: InteractiveConsoleEnabled
data.value: 互動式主控台現在處於活動狀態，鍵入「c」以進入命令模式。

data.name: InteractiveConsoleNotAvailable
data.value: 由於缺少 {0} 配置屬性，交互式主控台不可用。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of the missing config property (string)

data.name: BotGamesToRedeemInBackgroundCount
data.value: 機械人的後台佇列中還有 {0} 個遊戲。
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by remaining number of games in BGR's queue

data.name: ErrorSingleInstanceRequired
data.value: ASF 進程已在此工作目錄中運行，正在中止!

data.name: BotHandledConfirmations
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of confirmations

data.name: BotGeneratingSteamParentalCode
data.value: 正在產生 Steam 家庭監護代碼，這可能會需要一段時間，請考慮將它寫入設定檔中…
